recipe.title: Gin-Gin Mule
ingredients: 23 oz fresh lime juice (from 23 limes, which can be done in 15 minutes)
6 bundles of mint, half for muddling, the other half for garnish
instructions: Measure 1 part water to 1 part superfine sugar into a bottle that has a top. Close the lid and shake well. Let this settle, and then repeat 1 or 2 more times, until all the sugar is dissolved and the syrup is clear.

To make Gin-Gin Mule: Measure the lime juice, Simple Syrup, and mint into a mixing glass. Muddle well to extract the mint's flavor. Add ginger beer, gin, and ice. Garnish with a mint sprig. You can also add candied ginger for a more festive effect. Serve with a straw.
